Solving yields \((3)x=4420075\), thus dividing equally produces \(x=\frac{4420075}{3}=1473358.333\) (approximately). We round down since you cannot cast partial votes resulting in \[(x)\approx 1473358.\

Given `'T'` symbolizes all member count i.e., '4420075'. Hence `‘3z = 4420075.’ By isolation of variable Z , divide entire term by coefficient 3, yielding `z =~ 1473358.` Substituting value back into Y expression gets `[~](2*1473358)= ~ 2946716 `. Therefore approximate Votes casting in favourability toward fresh ordinance stands around `: ~ 2946716 ."
